SECRETNAME.Description: The secret name used to reference the secret key-value pair that contains your BC client secret (example: bcSecret-dev)

SECRETKEY.Description: The key for the key-value pari that contains your BC secret (example: client_secret)

SECRETARN.Description: The Amazon Resource Name for your Secret in Secrets Manager (example format: arn:aws:secretsmanager:<region>:<account id>:secret:<secret name>)

REDIRECTURI.Description: The Redirect URI that matches your app's Install URI to be used in the POST to login.bigcommerce.com/oauth2/token

BCCLIENTID.Description: The client ID provided by BC when you registered your application.
